{{Actor| | type = Gibs | name = Green chaos serpent right arm | class = Demon1Chunk1 | game = Hexen }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:DemonChunk|DemonChunk]]→Demon1Chunk1
One of the five chunks of meat thrown around when a [[Classes:Demon1|green chaos serpent]] is gibbed. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Demon1Chunk1 : [[Classes:DemonChunk|DemonChunk]] { States { Spawn: DEMA A 4 DEMA A 10 [[A_QueueCorpse]] DEMA A 20 Wait Death: DEMA A -1 Stop } }
